metadata.title: CVE-2022-1253 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository strukturag/libde265 prior to and including 1.0.8. The fix is established in commit 8e89fe0e175d2870c39486fdd09250b230ec10b8 but does not yet belong to an official release.

criterions.comment: libde265 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
